snippet: An Indian man wounded in an apparently racially motivated shooting that killed his friend at a suburban Kansas City bar has told detectives the gunman asked if their "status was legal."...

headline.main: Text: President Trump’s Executive Order on Immigration
headline.print_headline: Text: President Trump’s Executive Order on Immigration

lead_paragraph: An Indian man wounded in an apparently racially motivated shooting that killed his friend at a suburban Kansas City bar has told detectives the gunman asked if their "status was legal."
